title: Caspian's Casebook
content:
__**Vitals:**__

[[include component:image-block name=drgoh3.jpg|caption=Dr Goh testing the integrity of a mock containment cell for humans, colloquially known as an "escape room".|width=250px]]

**Name:** Dr. Goh ███

**Gender:** Male

**Age:** 30+

**Based in:** Site-65 (Singapore)

**Security Clearance:** Junior Researcher

**Research Interests:** Long-form narratives, far-reaching conspiracies and far too many world-ending scenarios. He enjoys reading and writing sci-fi and horror on the side.

**Educational Background:** Entirely irrelevant to current Foundation responsibilities.

__**Documents of Interest (in order of publication):**__

* [http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-4439 SCP-4439] - The Weeping Child
* [http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-4507 SCP-4507] - The Solitary Path to Enlightenment
* [http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-4649 SCP-4649] - BLOOD FOR THE BLOOD GOD
* [http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-4783 SCP-4783] - The Human Capital Convention
* [http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-4827 SCP-4827] - Ghost Stories Around a Black Hole
* [http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-5068 SCP-5068] - The Microbes Must Be Crazy
* [http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-4245 SCP-4245] - BellyFlopology
* [http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-5254 SCP-5254] - Gotta Catch 'Em All
* [http://www.scpwiki.com/scp-5263 SCP-5263] - The Nail That Sticks Out
* [http://www.scpwiki.com/scp-6081 SCP-6081] - 花見
author: caspian2
